list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor: Overhaul before_sanity.sh for robustness and configurability
This commit completely refactors the `before_sanity.sh` script to be more robust, configurable, and maintainable.
Key changes include: - **Configuration**: Moved hardcoded values like package names and port ranges to the top of the script for easy modification. - **Structured Functions**: Replaced the linear script with functions for specific tasks like killing processes (`safe_kill`), freeing ports (`free_ports`), and logging. - **Error Handling**: Implemented `set -euo pipefail` for safer execution. - **Robust Process Killing**: Added a two-step process to gracefully kill processes before force-killing them. - **Enhanced Logging**: Introduced a `log` function that outputs to both the console and a timestamped log file (`/tmp/test_cleanup_...`). - **ADB Improvements**: Made ADB operations more robust, checking if `adb` is installed and only acting on devices/emulators if they are present. - **Dry Run Mode**: Added a `--dry-run` flag to allow users to see what actions the script would perform without making any actual changes. - **Temporary File Cleanup**: Added logic to clean up temporary screenshots (`.png`) and log files from the `/tmp` directory. - **Main Function**: Encapsulated the entire script logic within a `main` function for better structure and argument parsing.

task.summary: Default task
login suite commit
login suite commit
commit edits
Refactor: voice full execute enhance

Refactor: Add profile helpers and tests
- Add helper functions for profile photo and name updates. - Implement test cases for changing profile photo (TC-012), updating the profile name (TC-013), and validating name rules (TC-014). - Add a new `nameRuleReminder` getter to `profile.page.js`. - Comment out existing country-related tests (TC-010, TC-011).

feat(profile): Update UI element selectors
- The selector for `nameRuleReminder` has been updated. - The `datePicker` selector has been uncommented for future use.

feat: Add and enhance profile tests
This commit introduces new tests for the profile section and enhances existing page objects and test cases.
- **feat(profile):** - Add a test case (`TC-012`) to validate changing the profile photo via the camera. This includes taking before and after screenshots for comparison. - Implement the `changeProfilePhotoByCamera` function with detailed steps for camera interaction, permission handling, and image cropping. - Add a test case (`TC-013`) to validate the name change functionality. - Add a test (`TC-014`) to verify that the name rule reminder is displayed when the name field is focused. - Add a test (`TC-015`) to validate the UI warning for invalid names. - Re-enable and update country change tests (`TC-016`, `TC-017`).
- **refactor(profile.page):** - Add the `EditProfileScreen` selector. - Rename `nameError` selector to `invalidNamePopup` and update its locator for better reliability. - Add comprehensive JSDoc comments to the `openProfileScreen` function.
- **chore(profile.test):** - Enable the `before` hook to clear app cache and handle initial setup. - Improve test structure by handling various popups and login states.

feat: Add and enhance profile tests

- **chore(profile.test):** - Enable the `before` hook to clear app cache and handle initial setup. - Improve test structure by handling various popups and login states.

feat: Add chat functionality tests
This commit introduces a new test suite for chat functionality.
It includes: - Page objects for the chat and friends list screens. - Helper functions to open existing chats and send text messages. - Test cases to verify sending and displaying messages in both English and Arabic.

refactor(chat): Improve message validation and add emoji test
Refactors the `isMessageDisplayed` method to be more robust. It now first attempts to find a message with an exact text match. If that fails, it falls back to a partial text match on the last message in the chat. This improves reliability, especially for messages containing emojis or dynamic content.
Adds a new test case to send and verify messages containing emojis.

Refactor: Add conversation starters test
This commit introduces a new test suite for the "Conversation Starters" feature.
Key changes include: - Added new page objects and helper methods for conversation starters. - Implemented tests to verify that refreshing conversation starters works as expected. - Added a test to confirm that a conversation starter can be successfully sent as a message. - Commented out the existing text message sending tests to focus on the new functionality.

Refactor: Add conversation starters test
This commit introduces a new test suite for the "Conversation Starters" feature.
Key changes include: - Added new page objects and helper methods for conversation starters. - Implemented tests to verify that refreshing conversation starters works as expected. - Added a test to confirm that a conversation starter can be successfully sent as a message. - Commented out the existing text message sending tests to focus on the new functionality.

Refactor: Add conversation starters test
This commit introduces a new test suite for the "Conversation Starters" feature.
Key changes include: - Added new page objects and helper methods for conversation starters. - Implemented tests to verify that refreshing conversation starters works as expected. - Added a test to confirm that a conversation starter can be successfully sent as a message. - Commented out the existing text message sending tests to focus on the new functionality.

Refactor: Improve message validation and chat tests
This commit refactors the `isMessageDisplayed` method in `Chat.page.js` to be more robust. It now retries finding messages over a timeout period, checks for both exact and partial matches across all displayed messages, and captures a screenshot on failure for easier debugging.
In `Chat.helper.js`, the `sendFirstConversationStarter` method is updated to ensure the send button is clickable before interacting with it, improving test stability.
Additionally, the previously commented-out 'Text Message Sending' test suite in `chat.test.js` has been re-enabled to validate chat functionality.

feat: Add conversation starter methods
Adds methods to the `Chat.page` object for interacting with conversation starters.
- `openConversationStarters()`: Opens the conversation starter suggestions. - `refreshConversationStarters()`: Clicks the refresh button for new suggestions. - `getCurrentStarterQuestions()`: Retrieves the text of the currently displayed starter questions.
Also removes unused imports from `Chat.helper.js`.

Refactor: Update test suite and selectors
- Reduce pause times in the login page object for faster execution. - Update element selectors in the profile page object for `profilePhoto` and `invalidNamePopup`. - Refactor the `changeProfilePhotoByCamera` method for improved stability and updated element interactions. - Add `chat.test.js` to the `SanityFullCheck` suite and reorder tests. - Modify the `NotificationAlertClose` helper to handle an alternative alert button. - Adjust test cases in `profile.test.js`, including changing the test name and invalid name value. - Switch `beforeEach` to `before` in `Login.test.js` for setup optimization.

Refactor: Update test suite and selectors
- Reduce pause times in the login page object for faster execution. - Update element selectors in the profile page object for `profilePhoto` and `invalidNamePopup`. - Refactor the `changeProfilePhotoByCamera` method for improved stability and updated element interactions. - Add `chat.test.js` to the `SanityFullCheck` suite and reorder tests. - Modify the `NotificationAlertClose` helper to handle an alternative alert button. - Adjust test cases in `profile.test.js`, including changing the test name and invalid name value. - Switch `beforeEach` to `before` in `Login.test.js` for setup optimization.

Refactor: Update test suite and selectors
- Reduce pause times in the login page object for faster execution. - Update element selectors in the profile page object for `profilePhoto` and `invalidNamePopup`. - Refactor the `changeProfilePhotoByCamera` method for improved stability and updated element interactions. - Add `chat.test.js` to the `SanityFullCheck` suite and reorder tests. - Modify the `NotificationAlertClose` helper to handle an alternative alert button. - Adjust test cases in `profile.test.js`, including changing the test name and invalid name value. - Switch `beforeEach` to `before` in `Login.test.js` for setup optimization.

Refactor: Update selectors and add logging in Settings page object
- Updated the notification permission button selector to use "تفعيل". - Added error handling, logging, and pauses to the `openAlerts` and `toggleSwitch` methods for improved stability and debugging.

refactor: Update tests and add voice call skip functionality
Refactors various test suites: - Comments out login and setup hooks in chat and profile tests. - Implements pointer action to bypass profiles in voice call matching test. - Adjusts swipe action and test data for country selection in the profile test. - Adds back navigation steps to clean up test states.

refactor: Update tests and add voice call skip functionality
Refactors various test suites: - Comments out login and setup hooks in chat and profile tests. - Implements pointer action to bypass profiles in voice call matching test. - Adjusts swipe action and test data for country selection in the profile test. - Adds back navigation steps to clean up test states.

refactor: Update tests and add back navigation
- Comments out setup hooks in chat, settings, login, and welcome bonus tests. RUNNING FULL SANITY CHECK TEST (SUCCESS) FLOW CHECKED AND VALIDATED - Removes an extra back navigation step in the profile test. - Adds a double back navigation to the `after` hook in the chat test to ensure a clean state. - Updates device list in IDE settings. - Reorders tests in `wdio.conf.js`.

refactor: Update tests and add back navigation
- Comments out setup hooks in chat, settings, login, and welcome bonus tests. RUNNING FULL SANITY CHECK TEST (SUCCESS) FLOW CHECKED AND VALIDATED - Removes an extra back navigation step in the profile test. - Adds a double back navigation to the `after` hook in the chat test to ensure a clean state. - Updates device list in IDE settings. - Reorders tests in `wdio.conf.js`.

refactor: Add test markers and clean up workspace
- Adds a "⚡" marker to test descriptions for better visibility. - Deletes the `deviceStreaming.xml` cache file from the `.idea` directory.

Refactor: Overhaul before_sanity.sh for robustness and configurability
This commit completely refactors the `before_sanity.sh` script to be more robust, configurable, and maintainable.
Key changes include: - **Configuration**: Moved hardcoded values like package names and port ranges to the top of the script for easy modification. - **Structured Functions**: Replaced the linear script with functions for specific tasks like killing processes (`safe_kill`), freeing ports (`free_ports`), and logging. - **Error Handling**: Implemented `set -euo pipefail` for safer execution. - **Robust Process Killing**: Added a two-step process to gracefully kill processes before force-killing them. - **Enhanced Logging**: Introduced a `log` function that outputs to both the console and a timestamped log file (`/tmp/test_cleanup_...`). - **ADB Improvements**: Made ADB operations more robust, checking if `adb` is installed and only acting on devices/emulators if they are present. - **Dry Run Mode**: Added a `--dry-run` flag to allow users to see what actions the script would perform without making any actual changes. - **Temporary File Cleanup**: Added logic to clean up temporary screenshots (`.png`) and log files from the `/tmp` directory. - **Main Function**: Encapsulated the entire script logic within a `main` function for better structure and argument parsing.

Refactor: Overhaul before_sanity.sh for robustness and configurability
This commit completely refactors the `before_sanity.sh` script to be more robust, configurable, and maintainable.
Key changes include: - **Configuration**: Moved hardcoded values like package names and port ranges to the top of the script for easy modification. - **Structured Functions**: Replaced the linear script with functions for specific tasks like killing processes (`safe_kill`), freeing ports (`free_ports`), and logging. - **Error Handling**: Implemented `set -euo pipefail` for safer execution. - **Robust Process Killing**: Added a two-step process to gracefully kill processes before force-killing them. - **Enhanced Logging**: Introduced a `log` function that outputs to both the console and a timestamped log file (`/tmp/test_cleanup_...`). - **ADB Improvements**: Made ADB operations more robust, checking if `adb` is installed and only acting on devices/emulators if they are present. - **Dry Run Mode**: Added a `--dry-run` flag to allow users to see what actions the script would perform without making any actual changes. - **Temporary File Cleanup**: Added logic to clean up temporary screenshots (`.png`) and log files from the `/tmp` directory. - **Main Function**: Encapsulated the entire script logic within a `main` function for better structure and argument parsing.

Refactor: Overhaul before_sanity.sh for robustness and configurability
This commit completely refactors the `before_sanity.sh` script to be more robust, configurable, and maintainable.
Key changes include: - **Configuration**: Moved hardcoded values like package names and port ranges to the top of the script for easy modification. - **Structured Functions**: Replaced the linear script with functions for specific tasks like killing processes (`safe_kill`), freeing ports (`free_ports`), and logging. - **Error Handling**: Implemented `set -euo pipefail` for safer execution. - **Robust Process Killing**: Added a two-step process to gracefully kill processes before force-killing them. - **Enhanced Logging**: Introduced a `log` function that outputs to both the console and a timestamped log file (`/tmp/test_cleanup_...`). - **ADB Improvements**: Made ADB operations more robust, checking if `adb` is installed and only acting on devices/emulators if they are present. - **Dry Run Mode**: Added a `--dry-run` flag to allow users to see what actions the script would perform without making any actual changes. - **Temporary File Cleanup**: Added logic to clean up temporary screenshots (`.png`) and log files from the `/tmp` directory. - **Main Function**: Encapsulated the entire script logic within a `main` function for better structure and argument parsing.
